SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend

Class Income

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.MoneyAction
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.Income
@Entity public class Income extends MoneyAction
Represents an income entry in the budget application. Inherits from the MoneyAction class. An Income object includes an amount, a description, a recurring type, and an income category.

    Constructs an Income object with the specified amount, description, recurring type, income category, and the date of the income.

  • Constructor Details

    • Income

      public Income(int amount, String description, RecurringType type, IncomeCategory incomeCategory, LocalDate dateAdded)
      Constructs an Income object with the specified amount, description, recurring type, income category, and the date of the income.
      Parameters:
      amount - the monetary amount, must be non-negative
      description - a non-empty, non-blank description of the income
      type - the recurring type of the income
      incomeCategory - the income category associated with the income
      dateAdded - the date of the income.

    • Income

      public Income(int amount, String description, RecurringType type, IncomeCategory incomeCategory)
      Constructs an Income object with the specified amount, description, recurring type and income category. Sets the date added to current time.
      Parameters:
      amount - the monetary amount, must be non-negative
      description - a non-empty, non-blank description of the income
      type - the recurring type of the income
      incomeCategory - the income category associated with the income
